Reviews.Content: family stayed bedroom villa midmarch trip disney – price beat internet special approximately 50 night spacious extremely quiet – building 6 top floor overlooked little pond farthest highway nice free shuttle brings disney earliest left morning people renting car parks location parks close – 10 minutes disney parking lots convenient car especially villa groceries site pools kiddie larger whirlpool bigger pool nicely heated liked kiddie pool midmarch little cold gazebo gas grills hamburgers sandbox gazebo son loved continental breakfast excellent – day french toast waffles danishes muffins bagels bread oatmeal cold cereals juices coffee tea milk weeklong stay apples occasions fruit grocery store chairs booster seats little ones – staff borrow nice plenty walk – neighborhood mix vacation properties hotels residential apartments boardwalk nature trail close laundry facilities located pool 2 wash 2 dry – quarters fantastic time – recommend management little maintenance instance tv bedroom stovetop burners looks water damage bathroom walls kitchen sink tiles bathroom floor cracked major complaint floors filthy dirty socks black bottoms walking usually wear shoes indoors conscious effort encourage family wear shoes bed – regular clean dropped mustard tile floor kitchen clean supply nice picked lot black dirt clean tile floors – intentionally left floor visible location floors cleaned – unfortunately – remained days understand housekeeping busy overwhelmed clean lot short amount time wonder vacuum floors am complained clean didnt feel isnt housekeeping responsibilities dirty floors maintenance issues truely enjoyed stay vacation

Reviews.Title: “Hated the bugs”
Reviews.Author: limelizard
Reviews.Content: price experience hoped photos displayed website building 1st dire upgrades ripped carpeting drywall falling walls bathroom toilet seats actually peeling tiny white bugs bathroom moved flying ants 2nd bathroom counted 15 killing shuttle bus leaves 3 times am return 3 times pm times bus comes match times disney world closes wait 45 minutes shuttle complementary breakfast limited choice eating restaurants restaurant hotelvilla walk 6 blocks restaurants

Reviews.Title: “Great Place To Stay, Enjoyable Alternative To Disney Hotels."”
Reviews.Author: arizcat95
Reviews.Content: stayed february 2010 sons 2nd birthday stayed times badly mismanaged gone downhill management try pleased definitely stay car trouble gm drove store fixed recommend highly

Reviews.Title: “Wow, This Disney Good Neighbor Hotel is just across the street from Disney property and what a value!”
Reviews.Author: OrlandoBeachbumguy
Reviews.Content: hotel located 15 miles disneys main gate eating complimentary deluxe breakfast getting disney easy via free hotel shuttle friendly helpful staff stay enjoyable grounds inside hotel clean cozy clean decorated tastefully close disney inexpensive
